content.question: Some art historians have theorized that Velasquez included a mirror in the background of Las Meninas in order to

choices.label: suggest that the viewer is seeing the painting from the perspective of the king and queen, whose presence it implies
include a hidden portrait of himself in a painting depicting royalty, to document his important status as court painter
warn the members of the royal court against the sins of vanity and emphasize the importance of valuing faith over worldly pursuits
symbolize the wisdom of the young princess depicted in the painting by referencing the act of self-reflection

content.answer: suggest that the viewer is seeing the painting from the perspective of the king and queen, whose presence it implies
